test_queries.addTest: INSERT INTO test (name, status_id, method_name, project_id, session_id, start_time, end_time, env, browser, author_id) VALUES ('%s','%d','%s','%d','%d','%s','%s','%s','%s','%d')
test_queries.updateTest: UPDATE test SET name='%s', status_id='%d', method_name='%s', project_id='%d', session_id='%d', start_time='%s', end_time='%s', env='%s', browser='%s', author_id='%d' WHERE id= '%d'
test_queries.getTestsWithTwoRepeatingDigitsInId: SELECT * FROM test WHERE id LIKE '%%%s%%' LIMIT %d

session_queries.addSession: INSERT INTO session (session_key, created_time, build_number) VALUES ('%s','%s','%s')
session_queries.updateSession: UPDATE session SET session_key=%s, created_time=%s, build_number=%s WHERE id= %s

author_queries.addAuthor: INSERT INTO author (name, login, email) VALUES ('%s','%s','%s')
author_queries.updateAuthor: UPDATE author SET name=%s, login=%s, email=%s WHERE id= %s

project_queries.updateProject: UPDATE project SET name=%s WHERE id= %d
